title.native: ヒプノシスマイク -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima
title.romaji: Hypnosis Mic -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima

description:
After the war, women have taken over ruling politics in the Chuo ward and have banned and destroyed weapons. This has caused men to fight through rap battles using Hypnosis Mics, which can be used to affect people's sympathetic nerves and influence their thought process. However, the legendary rap group, The Dirty Dawg, has split up into four groups, each representing a division of Tokyo, Japan and are engaging in territorial battles using words and the HypMics.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: Hypnosis Mic: Division Rap Battle - Rhyme Anima

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Gangs
tags.description: Centers around gang organizations.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Matriarchy
tags.description: Prominently features a country that is ruled by a Queen or a society that is dominated by female inheritance.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Hip-hop Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of hip-hop, not to be applied to anime that use hip-hop in its soundtrack.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Clone
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an artificial exact copy of another organism.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芝美奈子)

Noted for her character designs on [Black Butler](https://anilist.co/anime/4898/), [Noir](https://anilist.co/anime/272/), [Tegami Bachi](https://anilist.co/anime/6444/) among many others.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/katsuono)**

**Katsumi Ono** is a Japanese director, supervisor, episode director and storyboard artist.

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芝美奈子)

Noted for her character designs on [Black Butler](https://anilist.co/anime/4898/), [Noir](https://anilist.co/anime/272/), [Tegami Bachi](https://anilist.co/anime/6444/) among many others.

__Height:__ 174 cm
__Special skill:__ Singing
__Hobbies:__ Cooking, watching ammonites, playing with domestic cats

[Profile](http://edenzfeel.com/rushstyle/?talent=%E9%80%9F%E6%B0%B4-%E5%A5%A8) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/show_ism) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/3674.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Show_Hayami) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%80%9F%E6%B0%B4%E5%A5%A8)

He is a veteran voice actor and singer. His real name is Yasushi Oohama (大濱靖). He is married to fellow voice actress [Rei Igarashi](https://anilist.co/staff/102524).

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=11) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/amasakikohei)

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Loveless O'Shea - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)

**Height:** 174 cm

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/shirai_universe) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdrKW91dH2sN60Huk8pBMqg)

On September 12, 2022, it was revealed that he is married to the writer and former idol [Mariru Harada](https://anilist.co/staff/150544/Mariru-Harada), with whom he has a child.

[Website](http://www.ddl-ltd.co.jp/asanumashintarou.html) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/shintaro-asanuma/)

Shintarou Asanuma is a voice actor, dramatist, producer, copywriter, and designer. He was formerly affiliated with Office Osawa and is now part of Dandelion and is best known for voicing [Watashi](https://anilist.co/character/30579/) on [The Tatami Galaxy](https://anilist.co/anime/7785/), [Takatoshi Tsuda](https://anilist.co/character/32770/) on [Seitokai Yakuindomo](https://anilist.co/anime/8675/) and [Yousuke Kirie](https://anilist.co/character/2713/) on [Bokurano](https://anilist.co/anime/1690/).

**Non-anime roles:**
~!
- Alex in "Street Fighter V" (VG) (Japanese)
- Avatar (Male) in "Xenoblade Chronicles X" (VG) (Japanese)
- Azai Nagamasa in "Hana Oboro ~Sengoku-den Ranki~" (VG) (Japanese)
- Clay Kaczmarek/Subject 16 in "Assassin's Creed: Revelations" (VG) (Japanese)
- Darnell Sellers in "Hospital.: 6-nin no Ishi" (VG) (Japanese)
- Juran in "Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger" (tokusatsu series) (Japanese)
- Keiji Sendai in "Nogizaka Haruka no Himitsu: Cosplay Hajimemashita" (VG) (Japanese)
- Kou Tokisaka in "Tokyo Xanadu" (PS Vita ARPG) (Japanese)
- Kusuo Saiki in "J-Stars Victory VS" (VG) (Japanese)
- Lorenzo De' Medici in "Assassin's Creed II" (VG) (Japanese)
- Lu Xun in "Romance of the Three Kingdoms 13" (VG) (Japanese)
- Nakigitsune in "Touken Ranbu" (browser game) (Japanese)
- Ryan in "Granblue Fantasy" (VG) (Japanese)
- Ryōta Kawara in "Hatoful Boyfriend" (Drama CD) (Japanese)
- Shulk in "Xenoblade" (VG) (Japanese)
- Sambaba in "Doubutsu Sentai Zyuohger" (Tokusatsu series) (Japanese)
- Wataru Inoguchi in "Getsuei no Kusari -Kyouran Moratorium-" (VG) (Japanese)
- Wataru Inoguchi in "Getsuei no Kusari -Sakuran Paranoia-" (VG) (Japanese)
- Zed in "Lollipop Chainsaw" (VG) (Japanese) 

(Source: Anime News Network) !~

__Height:__ 169.6cm (5"7')
__Agent:__ 81 Produce

__[Website](https://www.saitosoma.com/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/somasaito/) | [Profile (81produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%95%E8%A1%8C&label=1&cell004=&name=%E6%96%89%E8%97%A4%E3%80%80%E5%A3%AE%E9%A6%AC&id=47) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SomaStaff)__

He started his singing career in 2017. Named Best Rookie Actor at the 9th Seiyu Awards (2015) and won the Singing Award at the 16th Seiyu Awards (2021).

**Non-anime roles:**
~!• [Chongyun](https://anilist.co/character/233899/Chongyun) - Genshin Impact (VG)!~

[Profile](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=9) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/2403isn) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/21s_ken) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kent_110_va/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/1bPpm1gD9bX3hXCYaORYlw?autoplay=true)

**Non-Anime Roles**:
• Dan Heng (Honkai: Star Rail)
• Toya Aoyagi (Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku)

__Height:__ 183 cm (6 ft 0 in)

[Profile](https://www.atomicmonkey.jp/jp/archives/talent/kimurasubaru) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/GiantSUBAru) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/richpotatoboya/?hl=en)

A German–Japanese actor, voice actor and narrator affiliated with talent agency [Atomic Monkey](http://www.atomicmonkey.jp/jp/), his best-known role is voicing Takeshi Goda in the Doraemon series, which has spawned numerous specials.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - As soon as man is born he begins to die.
Episode 2 - Speak of the devil and he will appear.
Episode 3 - Two heads are better than one.
Episode 4 - A friend in need is a friend indeed.
Episode 6 - He who laughs last, laughs best.
Episode 7 - The darkest hour is just before the dawn.
Episode 8 - Dead men tell no tales.
Episode 9 - Life is what you make it.
Episode 10 - Today is a good day to die.
Episode 12 - You can't make an omelet without breaking eggs.
